clean_text[source]

clean_text(doc_lines)

Removes punctuations and digits from document and returns tokens

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

clean_tokens[source]

clean_tokens(tokens)

Removes stopwords, tokens with length less than 3 characters and stems them PorterStemmer is used for stemming

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

clean[source]

clean(doc)

Cleans a document by removing punctuations, digits, stopwords, tokens shorter than 3 characters

{% endraw %}
